data.persona: I am the floor in the dining hall of the king's castle.  I don't like it when rude guests spill wine, mead, and food on me.  I get to go to all the best parties but no one ever really talks to me except the jester.  Oh, the stories I could tell of what goes on after hours.
data.description:
You are in the staircase.
The staircase is spiral and made of stone. The stone is smooth and cold from years of friction. The staircase reaches multiple levels of the tower and is the only way up or down.
There's some water and some cement here.
A wall is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a rug.

data.short_motivation: Make myself look nice with new rug.
data.mid_motivation: Have the king notice what a wonderful floor I am.
data.long_motivation: Everyone respects me and includes me in the parties.
